documentation.text:
@author Dezentralizator
@notice An example of interface to use as Harberger Tax
@dev the famous Haberger transfer, allows anyone to claim the NFT at its listed price.
@dev Haberger transfer allowing to choose reset price
@dev sets the price of token at which anyone can buy the NFT
@dev allows to easily fetch information about the previous tax accumulated
@dev returns the total price needed to activate a transfer
@dev returns the tax caused by ongoing pricing period.

@author Dezentralizator
@notice An example of interface to use as Harberger Tax
@dev the famous Haberger transfer, allows anyone to claim the NFT at its listed price.
@dev Haberger transfer allowing to choose reset price
@dev sets the price of token at which anyone can buy the NFT
@dev allows to easily fetch information about the previous tax accumulated
@dev returns the total price needed to activate a transfer
@dev returns the tax caused by ongoing pricing period.

claim(uint256).details: the famous Haberger transfer, allows anyone to claim the NFT at its listed price.

claimAndSetPrice(uint256,uint96).details: Haberger transfer allowing to choose reset price

getHarbergerPrice(uint256).details: returns the total price needed to activate a transfer

getHarbergerTax(uint256).details: allows to easily fetch information about the previous tax accumulated

remainingTax(uint256).details: returns the tax caused by ongoing pricing period.

setTokenPrice(uint256,uint96).details: sets the price of token at which anyone can buy the NFT

userdoc.notice: An example of interface to use as Harberger Tax
